The 'ATR 72' is a twin-engine turboprop short-haul regional airliner built by
the French-Italian aircraft manufacturer ATR. A stretched variant of the ATR 42,
the aircraft seats up to 78 passengers in a single-class configuration, and is
operated by a two-pilot crew.
